anya-e1202n6:0_0: The account of going to Bodhi
anya-e1202n6:1_1: At the Campā was established in the royal compound with five hundred females, together with a hundred thousand coins, by the senior monks, by means of a hundred thousand coins, by appointment, and by perfection.
anya-e1202n6:1_2: With Ariṭṭha, the king together with five hundred men.
anya-e1202n6:1_3: and goes to the king’s power before he went to see the senior monks.
anya-e1202n6:1_4: And the king brought him to him.
anya-e1202n6:1_5: Radattapāṇi, you placed on the ground, with flowers, and rimmed in flowers of salt,

anya-e1202n6:2_1: In this context, great king, will have the observance-day hall.

anya-e1202n6:3_1: I’ve made a loud noise of the rains residence in a place, the gods of fairykind who build a monument for twelve-hundred and fifty leagues, where the carpets all around, and the king of mountains. Then he draws back from status, departed and placed a lamp.
